description: Animates between random values defined by a min and max value

input_ports.name: Valuemin
input_ports.description: Minimum random value that can be generated

input_ports.name: max
input_ports.description: Maximum random value that can be generated

input_ports.name: Timingduration
input_ports.description: How long it takes to animate from the random min and max values

input_ports.name: pause between
input_ports.description: Define a pause between each random animation cycle

output_ports.name: Looped
output_ports.description: Trigger out each time the animation reaches its end

description: Simple animation between two values

input_ports.name: rewind
input_ports.description: Rewinds animation to start but only after its finished

input_ports.name: duration
input_ports.description: Duration to get from start to end value

input_ports.name: loop
input_ports.description: enable to loop animation back and forth

output_ports.name: finished
output_ports.description: Outputs true when animation is finished

output_ports.name: Finished Trigger
output_ports.description: Outputs a trigger when animation is finished

description: Animation in the form of a sine/cosine curve (sinus/cos)

input_ports.name: Mode index
input_ports.description: phase (Number)Can be used to shift the animation, e.g. if you use two SineAnim-ops which should not be in sync. Should be an angle in radians.

input_ports.name: frequency
input_ports.description: Make it bigger than 1 to speed the animation up

input_ports.name: amplitude
input_ports.description: How small / big the values can become, setting it to 2 e.g. results in an output between -2 and 2

output_ports.name: result
output_ports.description: A value cycling between -Amplitude and Amplitude

description: Smooths out jumps in values (AverageInterpolation)

input_ports.name: Slowdown
input_ports.description: slows down value increase while near a snappoint
